English: succeed or fail, sharp or blunt (idiom); advantages and disadvantages

q: `三國~`蜀~．`諸葛亮~〈`聞~`孫權~`破~`曹~`休兵~`東下~`關中~`虛弱~`上~`言~〉：「`臣~`鞠躬~`盡力~，`死而後已~，`至~`于~`成敗利鈍~，`非~`臣~`之~`明~`所~`能~`逆睹~`也~。」

English: succeed or fail, sharp or blunt (idiom); advantages and disadvantages
